channel.title: Player Rights
channel.description:
I go into my source folder, go into "Characters" open up my name in the .txt. file.
I change "Player rights = 0" to "Player rights = 3" (Owned/admin right?), compile, run and i don't have a gold crown - but thats not the weird thing. I go back into "Characters" and on my .txt file and the player rights have changed back to "0"?!? WTF!?!?!!!!!

item.title: Player Rights
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

You need to be logged out from the server to change your rights.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @heavinlyevil heavinlyevil
item.description:
@heavinlyevil wrote:

u don’t actually have to do that tbh

Read full topic

item.description:
@laurens800 wrote:

of that doesnt work go to data>administrator>yourname

Read full topic

item.title: Player Rights
item.dc:creator: @heavinlyevil heavinlyevil
item.description:
@heavinlyevil wrote:

you can try this
Playerwrites

0=Member
1=p mod
2=admin
3=owner

Then open client.java and serch for

else out.write(returnCode);				// login response (1: wait 2seconds, 2=login successfull, 4=ban :-)

then under it add

if (playerRights == 3) { out.write(2); //Crown fixup } else { out.write(playerRights); // mod level }

add all of this if you don’t ahve it

Read full topic
